verses.name: John 19:37
verses.text: And again another scripture saith, They shall look on him whom they pierced.

verses.name: John 19:38
verses.text: And after this Joseph of Arimathea, being a disciple of Jesus, but secretly for fear of the Jews, besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus: and Pilate gave him leave. He came therefore, and took the body of Jesus.

verses.name: John 19:39
verses.text: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.
